answers.answer: Congratulations and welcome to the pink team! ;-)

Hi, thats great emma! I just wanted to say that I also have good news, (sorry no more room to post) I just had my glucose test done and it came back normal. This is such a relief because I had gestational diabetes with my last pregnancy and thought for sure I was doomed to have it this time. I am so glad I will not have to be induced for this reason again.. I have to add aslo that I cannot believe how fast this pregnancy is going, Im 27 wks and counting,,,,,It just flew by. Guess the holidays help....

question: hi all,some excellent news..i went 2 my 20weeks scan today and everything is fine,and also i was told that he thought the baby was a girl which also is excellent,thank you very much for your support a couple days ago,hope you are all feeling the same happiness either now or in the very near future,emma :)
title: great news..
